food1.name: Turkey Leg
food1.description: A massive leg of juicy turkey that will satisfy even the hungriest of fest-goers!

food2.name: Ale
food2.description: This medieval style brew has deep earthy flavors and a rich amber color. Be careful though, It's very strong.

food3.name: Corn Dog
food3.description: These festival classics are a staple of any fair. Come grab a dog or six!

food4.name: Funnel Cake
food4.description: These delicious blueberry funnel cakes are made with love and blueberries. Also Available without blueberries. Not available without love.
